triggerQueries: 3. Can I settle my credit card bills of the Bank / other banks through your Internet Banking Service? - Payment - Personal Internet Banking
intents.displayName: 3. Can I settle my credit card bills of the Bank / other banks through your Internet Banking Service? - Payment - Personal Internet Banking

dialogs.displayName: 3. Can I settle my credit card bills of the Bank / other banks through your Internet Banking Service? - Payment - Personal Internet Banking

web.content:
**3.  Can I settle my credit card bills of the Bank / other banks through your Internet Banking Service?**
  

Ans:Yes, you can pay bills of any of the credit card merchants listed on JET PAYMENT. Settling bills of unregistered credit card accounts is a high risk transaction which needs two-factor authentication tool to complete the transactions, if the bill payments exceed the Small-value Fund Transfer limit. On the other hand, settling bills of registered credit card accounts does not require two-factor authentication tool for transactions. You can access JET PAYMENT webpage (select “Hong Kong” > “Credit Card payment”) for the Internet Bill Payment Merchant List.
